title: The Writer's Almanac for Saturday, December 25, 2021
description: Christmas Day. Also the birthday of Dorothy Wordsworth, sister of William Wordsworth, whom we now know used some of his sister’s writings in his poems.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
